desc: Hoppi™ Baby Wet Wipes is a specially designed 99 percent water wipes for newborns. It's thicker, softer, and stronger than average baby wet wipes. Ideal for keeping at diaper changes, as fresh-up wipes and general cleaning. Happy Mums Love Hoppi Wipes. Launched exclusively to serve mums in Malaysia & Singapore.

layout.text: Premium Quality Baby Product Made Affordable for All Mums
